name: Bomb Bucketeer! (Ver.1.0)
description:
Arcade Style Gameplay - Catch the falling mini Nuclear Bombs in buckets of water!

Play though 10 Levels of excitement!! 

Fast Paced - Stimulating Acrade style idea based on the classic Atari game "Kaboom"

with many additional features and animation effects!

Low Price based on game engine originality, but with custom sprites and a multitude of nerve wrenching coding to create each individual falling bomb's coordinates!!

Many have attempted to create a game similar, but they have never completed it because of it's extreme repetitious coding of events! especially all 10 levels.

Updates may come later on... as I progressively try and discover scripts for scoring and alternative smoother animation and additional levels. Thank You!!
